amendment.description: An amendment numbered 156 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used in violation of section 129a of title 10, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used in violation of section 129a of title 10, United States Code, which states "The Secretary may not reduce the civilian workforce programmed full-time equivalent levels unless the Secretary conducts an appropriate analysis of the impacts of such reductions on workload, military force structure, lethality, readiness, operational effectiveness, stress on the military force, and fully burdened costs.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 215 - 218 (Roll no. 437).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 215 - 218 (Roll no. 437).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
